name: Lightning Warrior Raidy 2: Temple of Desire
name_original: Lightning Warrior Raidy 2: Temple of Desire
description:
Lightning Warrior Raidy 2: Temple of Desire is a RPG game developed by ZyX. It came out on 29-06-2010. It was published by JAST USA.
Lightning Warrior Raidy 2: Temple of Desire is available on PC.
